name: Trouble with a Weird Gnome
description: Rumors of a weird gnome with bright orange hair and glowing eyes have spread through the kingdom.

criticalSuccess.msg: Kingdom investigators and spellcasters confirm that the weird gnome is likely no gnome at all, but a mischievous trickster fey, potentially from the fey world. This knowledge allows your kingdom to both respond to the mischief more quickly and soothes the worries of the citizens. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="lose" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Lose 1 Unrest</button>

success.msg: Kingdom investigators fail to track down the gnome, and while sightings eventually taper off, the damage is done and the citizens continue to worry. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button>

failure.msg: No explanation for the weird gnome’s antics are ever arrived at, and in addition to making the citizens uneasy, some of the gnome’s pranks had lasting effects. and increase a Ruin of your choice by 1

criticalFailure.msg: No explanation for the weird gnome’s antics are ever arrived at, and in addition to making the citizens uneasy, some of the gnome’s pranks had lasting effects. and increase two Ruins of your choice by 1
